home.WarningNoteS: Community development, not speaking on behalf of Ripple (company), etc. etc.

submit.HeaderS: Show your design to the XRP community
submit.Rule1: You agree that you are submitting your original work, and that the work you submit is licensed under a Creative Commons 0 license.
submit.Rule2: Submissions must be received by June 1st, 12:00AM EST.
submit.Rule3: Voting begins June 2nd and ends June 16th and 12:00AM EST. The symbol with the most votes will be submitted for inclusion as a Unicode character.
submit.Rule4: Images may not contain defamatory, controversial or graphic imagery.
submit.Rule5: Submissions may not contain trademarked components. Submissions that impinge on existing marks will be removed prior to voting.
submit.Rule6: Images must be easy to write by hand, and need to scale well (think 8 point font).
submit.Rule7: A brief, written description of the symbolism must accompany each submission.
submit.InvalidSize: Image Size can not be more than 5 Mb
submit.SuccessRegister: Your Symbol Registered Successfully and waiting for approve to publish.
